cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuzuku

sentence.kanji: 工事は3月まで続きます。
sentence.romaji: kouji ha sangatsu made tsuzukimasu
sentence.english: Construction will continue until March.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ishoni

sentence.kanji: 一緒に帰りましょう。
sentence.romaji: ishoni kaerimashou
sentence.english: Let's go home together.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's midori

sentence.kanji: この町には緑がたくさんあります。
sentence.romaji: kono machi ni ha midori ga takusan arimasu
sentence.english: There's a lot of greenery in this town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hosoi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は指が細いですね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha yubi ga hosoi desu ne
sentence.english: Her fingers are thin.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimeru

sentence.kanji: 彼はシートベルトを締めた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shi-toberuto wo shimeta
sentence.english: He fastened his seat belt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's asate

sentence.kanji: 明後日は休日です。
sentence.romaji: asate ha kyuujitsu desu 。
sentence.english: The day after tomorrow's a holiday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saigo

sentence.kanji: 今日が夏休み最後の日だ。
sentence.romaji: kyou ga natsuyasumi saigo no hi da
sentence.english: Today's the last day of summer vacation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatsu

sentence.kanji: あれから14年が経ちました。
sentence.romaji: are kara juuyonen ga tachimashita
sentence.english: Fourteen years have passed since then.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's e

sentence.kanji: これは有名な画家の絵です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha yuumei na gaka no e desu
sentence.english: This is a painting by a famous painter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's renshuu

sentence.kanji: 娘は今、バイオリンを練習しています。
sentence.romaji: musume ha ima baiorin wo renshuu shite imasu
sentence.english: My daughter is practicing the violin now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ketsugou

sentence.kanji: ファイルを結合して1つにしました。
sentence.romaji: fuairu wo ketsugou shite hitotsu ni shimashita
sentence.english: I consolidated the files into just one.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keka

sentence.kanji: 試合の結果を早く知りたい。
sentence.romaji: shiai no keka wo hayaku shiritai
sentence.english: I want to know soon the results of the game.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ジェットki

sentence.kanji: ジェット機が飛んでいる。
sentence.romaji: jietoki ga tonde iru
sentence.english: The jet plane is flying.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuzukeru

sentence.kanji: 仕事を続けてください。
sentence.romaji: shigoto wo tsuzukete kudasai
sentence.english: Please continue working.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuuryou

sentence.kanji: 来年から給料が上がります。
sentence.romaji: rainen kara kyuuryou ga agarimasu
sentence.english: I'm getting a pay raise as of next year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kikai

sentence.kanji: 新しい機械が壊れた。
sentence.romaji: atarashii kikai ga kowareta
sentence.english: The new machine broke.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seiki

sentence.kanji: 新しい世紀の始まりです。
sentence.romaji: atarashii seiki no hajimari desu
sentence.english: It's the start of a new century.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kurikaesu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は同じ間違いを繰り返した。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha onaji machigai wo kurikaeshita
sentence.english: She repeated the same mistake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's komakai

sentence.kanji: 彼女は細かいことにうるさい。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha komakai koto ni urusai
sentence.english: She's fussy about small details.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's komaka

sentence.kanji: それは細かな問題です。
sentence.romaji: sore ha komaka na mondai desu
sentence.english: That's a complex issue.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoukai

sentence.kanji: 両親に彼女を紹介した。
sentence.romaji: ryoushin ni kanojo wo shoukai shita
sentence.english: I introduced my girlfriend to my parents.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keiei

sentence.kanji: 我が社の経営はうまくいっています。
sentence.romaji: wagasha no keiei ha umaku ite imasu
sentence.english: Our company is well managed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ehagaki

sentence.kanji: 友達から絵葉書が届きました。
sentence.romaji: tomodachi kara ehagaki ga todokimashita
sentence.english: I received a picture postcard from a friend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mago

sentence.kanji: 昨日、孫が生まれました。
sentence.romaji: kinou mago ga umaremashita
sentence.english: My grandchild was born yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's momen

sentence.kanji: 彼女は木綿のシャツを着ています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha momen no shatsu wo kite imasu
sentence.english: She's wearing a cotton shirt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ito

sentence.kanji: 母は糸を針に通した。
sentence.romaji: haha ha ito wo hari ni tooshita
sentence.english: My mother threaded the needle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sentakuki

sentence.kanji: 新しい洗濯機を買いました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii sentaki wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought a new washing machine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senpuuki

sentence.kanji: 暑いから扇風機をつけよう。
sentence.romaji: atsui kara senpuuki wo tsukeyou
sentence.english: It's hot, so let's turn on the fan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikutsu

sentence.kanji: 娘さんは幾つになりましたか。
sentence.romaji: musumesan ha ikutsu ni narimashita ka
sentence.english: How old is your daughter now?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nochi

sentence.kanji: 後に彼は総理大臣になりました。
sentence.romaji: nochi ni kare ha souri daijin ni narimashita
sentence.english: He would later become Prime Minister.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youchien

sentence.kanji: 娘は幼稚園に通っています。
sentence.romaji: musume ha youchien ni kayote imasu
sentence.english: My daughter goes to kindergarten.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's murasaki

sentence.kanji: 彼女は紫のドレスを着ていた。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha murasaki no doresu wo kite ita
sentence.english: She wore a purple dress.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koucha

sentence.kanji: 温かい紅茶が飲みたい。
sentence.romaji: atatakai koucha ga nomitai
sentence.english: I want to drink hot tea.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikura

sentence.kanji: この靴は幾らですか。
sentence.romaji: kono kutsu ha ikura desu ka
sentence.english: How much are these shoes?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atogaki

sentence.kanji: 後書きをよく読んで下さい。
sentence.romaji: atogaki wo yoku yonde kudasai
sentence.english: Please read the postscript carefully.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atomawashi

sentence.kanji: おしゃべりは後回しにしましょう。
sentence.romaji: oshaberi ha atomawashi ni shimashou
sentence.english: Let's leave the chit-chat for later.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zengo

sentence.kanji: そちらに着くのは6時前後です。
sentence.romaji: sochira ni tsuku no ha rokuji zengo desu
sentence.english: I will arrive there around 6 o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saishuu

sentence.kanji: 東京行きの最終電車は何時ですか。
sentence.romaji: toukyouyuki no saishuu densha ha nanji desu ka
sentence.english: What time is the last train for Tokyo?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuuten

sentence.kanji: 電車の終点で降りました。
sentence.romaji: densha no shuuten de orimashita
sentence.english: I got off at the terminal.

cards.english: from beginning to end, at all times
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shijuu

sentence.kanji: その部屋は始終、人が出入りしているね。
sentence.romaji: sono heya ha shijuu hito ga deiri shite iru ne
sentence.english: People keep going in and out of the room.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuuden

sentence.kanji: 終電にやっと間に合った。
sentence.romaji: shuuden ni yato maniata
sentence.english: I was just in time for the last train.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ehon

sentence.kanji: その子は絵本が大好きです。
sentence.romaji: sono ko ha ehon ga daisuki desu
sentence.english: That child loves picture books.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oeru

sentence.kanji: やっと宿題を終えた。
sentence.romaji: yato shukudai wo oeta
sentence.english: At last I have finished my homework.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouhou

sentence.kanji: 彼は後方の座席に着いたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kouhou no zaseki ni tsuita no
sentence.english: He sat down on a rear seat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kekyoku

sentence.kanji: 彼は結局何を言いたかったのだろう。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kekyoku nani wo iitakata no darou
sentence.english: I wonder what he wanted to say after all.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's musubi

sentence.kanji: 彼は会の結びとしてスピーチをしたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kai no musubi to shite supi-chi wo shita yo
sentence.english: He made a speech to close the meeting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keiyu

sentence.kanji: メールを経由して広がるウィルスもあります。
sentence.romaji: me-ru wo keiyu shite hirogaru uirusu mo arimasu
sentence.english: There are even viruses that spread via e-mail.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kikai

sentence.kanji: 家族で話し合う機会を持ちました。
sentence.romaji: kazoku de hanashiau kikai wo mochimashita
sentence.english: I set up an opportunity to have a discussion with the family.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jiki

sentence.kanji: あせらずに時機を待つべきです。
sentence.romaji: aserazu ni jiki wo matsu beki desu
sentence.english: You should wait patiently for the right opportunity.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kesei

sentence.kanji: 新しい代表チームが結成されました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii daihyou chi-mu ga kesei saremashita
sentence.english: The new representative team was formed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kousha

sentence.kanji: 正しい答は後者です。
sentence.romaji: tadashii kotae ha kousha desu
sentence.english: The right answer is the latter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keihi

sentence.kanji: これからは経費を節約しましょう。
sentence.romaji: kore kara ha keihi wo setsuyaku shimashou
sentence.english: From now on let's save on expenses.
